title: Theresa Nist Celebrated Daughter Jen's Birthday Amid 'Golden Wedding' - Us Weekly
text:
The Golden Bachelorâ€™s
Theresa Nist had a lot to celebrate on Thursday, January 4. Not only did the reality star officially get married to Gerry Turner, she celebrated daughter Jen Woolstonâ€™s birthday as well.
â€œHappy birthday to my beautiful, strong, kind, supportive, loving, super smart, and overall wonderful and amazing daughter, and my best friend, Jennifer Ann!!â€ Theresa shared via Instagram on Thursday, January 4. â€œI could not dream of a better daughter. I love you with all my heart!!! I hope you have the best birthday ever!!!!â€
Jenâ€™s birthday was briefly mentioned during
The Golden Wedding special when she spoke during her momâ€™s wedding ceremony.
â€œPlease welcome Theresaâ€™s daughter, Jen. And happy birthday, Jen,â€ wedding officiant and former
Golden Bachelor contestant Susan Noles said during the televised ceremony. Theresa offered a big smile and clapped for her daughter when her birthday was mentioned.
â€œIâ€™ve said many times since I first heard the incredible news that my mom and Gerry were engaged that this feels surreal, like, how is this real life?â€ Jen wondered during her speech during Thursdayâ€™s live ceremony. â€œBut somehow, it was always meant to be. Fate. Mom, you found your person to go to Italy with. And Gerry, youâ€™ve got your person to share a sunset with. And you have the love and support of all your children and grandchildren.â€
Jen was first introduced to Golden Bachelor viewers during Theresaâ€™s hometown date, which aired in November 2023. She was always supportive of her momâ€™s decision to find love, after the
death of her father, William â€œBillyâ€ Nist, nearly a decade ago.
â€œIt doesnâ€™t really feel that weird for some reason,â€ Jen, whose kids were part of the wedding, said on the Golden Bachelor. â€œIt doesnâ€™t change how much love we have for my dad.â€
When it came time for Theresaâ€™s wedding ceremony to Gerry, Jen was front and center for the planning process.
â€œMy daughter has been helping me tremendously. She put together the vision board, and it was all beautiful. I love flowers, so important, and I love music,â€ Theresa
told Us Weekly exclusively days before her wedding. â€œI think just really to make this the most warm, wonderful family-oriented wedding, and to try not to even think that there are cameras around. Try to make it an intimate moment that weâ€™re sharing with a lot of people.â€
Ahead of the big day, Jen posted throwback photos from her own wedding to husband Matt Woolston in 2011.
â€œSitting on the planeâ€¦ went back to look at pics from my wedding day,â€ she captioned a Tuesday, January 2,
Instagram post. â€œCanâ€™t wait to support my best girl like she did for me. love you @theresa_nist youâ€™re going to be an incredible bride and I canâ€™t wait to see it with my own eyes. ğŸ’›ğŸ’›ğŸ’›â€
